Author: drivingintheback
Text: I would like to comment that restricting your body for the calories it needs will make you appear somewhat bigger and bloated. Hopefully that will help you to stop fasting

Author: Cuddle-A-Caribou
Text: Be safe please, keep up with your electrolytes. ❤️  For me I love being around food that I can’t have, it’s weird. I love to feel it and smell it and watch other people eat it because I know that I’m not eating it IDK.
